description: Enterprise techniques used by HEXANE, ATT&CK group G1001 v1.0
name: HEXANE (G1001)

techniques.comment: [HEXANE](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Group/G0005) utilizes VBA macros and Powershell scripts such as DanDrop and kl.ps1 tools.(Citation: SecurityWeek Hexane Aug 2019)(Citation: BankInfoSecurity Lyceum Aug 2019)
[HEXANE](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Group/G0005) has used malicious documents to drop malware and gain access into an environment.(Citation: Dragos Hexane)

[HEXANE](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Group/G0005) has used valid IT accounts to extend their spearphishing campaign within an organization.(Citation: SecureWorks LYCEUM Aug 2019)

[HEXANE](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Group/G0005) targeted telecommunication providers in the greater Middle East, Central Asia, and Africa, potentially as a stepping stone to network-focused man-in-the-middle and related attacks.(Citation: Dragos Hexane)
[HEXANE](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Group/G0005) communicated with command and control over HTTP and DNS.(Citation: Dragos Hexane)
